results.title: The Neverhood
results.brief_description: The game follows the adventure of a claymation character named Klaymen as he discovers his origins and his purpose in a world made entirely out of clay.

constellations_other.name: Little, big worlds
constellations_other.description: Wes Anderson's stop-motion animation film draws on tried-and-true techniques that, despite the rise of computer-generated imagery, still inspire filmmakers and game-makers.

results.title: The Neverending story 2: the next chapter
results.creator_credit: George Miller, Dieter Geissler and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Bastian (Jonathan Brandis), the reluctant hero of “The Neverending story” is unhappy away from Fantasia. His dad seems to have forgotten about his deceased mother and is dating someone Bastian doesn’t like, and Bastian didn’t make the swim team because he was afraid of heights and couldn’t jump off the diving board. He is drawn back to Fantasia to the friends he made; the Childlike Empress, Atreyu, Falkor, and Rock Biter. There are also fantastic new creatures to meet like Mudwart, Lavaman, Windbride, Instrument Spinster, Tri-Face, the Wamboes and Nimbly. There is a job to be done in Fanstasia however, as the sorceress Xayide and Smerg the evil dragon have unscrupulous plans for Fantasia. It’s up to Bastian and his friends to once again save Fantasia and prevent a disaster. Also starring Alexandra Johnes, Kenny Morrison, Clarissa Burt and John Wesley Shipp. This video also features a cartoon preview, “Box office bunny”, the first Bugs Bunny theatrical cartoon in 26 years.
results.creator_credit_for_label: George Miller, Dieter Geissler and Warner Bros Pictures

results.title: The Neverending Story (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Wolfgang Petersen, Dieter Geissler and Bernard Eichinger
results.brief_description: A young boy escapes the neighbourhood bullies by retreating into a mysterious book that takes him into a shimmering fantasy world of creatures, giant forests and massive oceans. It is an awesome world, but a world in decay, and its existence is being threatened. Rated: G.

results.title: The NeverEnding Story
results.creator_credit: Bavaria Film, Constantin Film, Westdeutscher Rundfunk, Rolf Zehetbauer, Bernd Eichinger, Count Ul De Rico, Diemut Remy, Bernd Schaefers, Herman Weigel, Dieter Geissler and Wolfgang Petersen
results.brief_description: While hiding from bullies in his school’s attic, a young boy discovers the extraordinary land of Fantasia, through a magical book called The Neverending Story. The book tells the tale of Atreyu, a young warrior who, with the help of a luck dragon named Falkor, must save Fantasia from the destruction of The Nothing.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bavaria Film, Constantin Film, Westdeutscher Rundfunk, Rolf Zehetbauer, Bernd Eichinger, Count Ul De Rico, Diemut Remy, Bernd Schaefers, Herman Weigel, Dieter Geissler and Wolfgang Petersen

results.title: The Netsilik eskimo today
results.creator_credit: Gilles Blais, Francois Seguillon, John Friedman and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: This film, made in 1972, shows the life of an Inuit family in the settlement of Pelly Bay inside the Arctic Circle. Under a federal government scheme, permanent heated housing, a school and a store are provided for the community. This film affords a glimpse of the Inuit adaptation to these changed conditions.

results.title: The Netherland
results.creator_credit: Bert Haanstra and Bert Haanstra Film Productions
results.brief_description: Directed by internationally known film maker Bert Haanstra, this non narrated impressionistic film looks at various facets of life and landscapes of which the Netherlands is composed. The filmmaker has also cleverly woven into the film structure, several visual deceptions making the film of value to media studies classes.

results.title: The Nest egg
results.creator_credit: Stephen Ramsey, Suzanne Baker, AMP Society and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Ageing in the New Age”.
A dramatized re-enactment which highlights the options and dangers awaiting the newly retired who are dazzled by investment choices. Stresses the pitfalls that can await those people retiring with large sums of cash.

results.title: The Nervous system
results.brief_description: A study of the structure of the nervous system of the human being; the following points are given detailed treatment: the nature of a nervous impulse; the pathways and connections of the nervous system; the conditions which set up nervous impulses; their passage from cell to cell; their discharge and resultant activity; reflexes, sensory integration, and activity of the cerebrum.

results.title: The Neon Demon
results.creator_credit: Esben Bjerring, Erin Benach, Elliott Hostetter, Mary Laws, Polly Stenham, Sidonie Dumas, Nicolas Winding Refn, Lene Børglum, Vincent Maraval, Space Rocket Nation, Vendian Entertainment, Bold Films and Amazon Studios
results.headline_credit: Denmark, France and United States of America, 2016
results.brief_description: When aspiring model Jesse moves to Los Angeles, her youth and vitality are devoured by a group of beauty-obsessed women who will take any means necessary to get what she has.

constellations_other.name: Wild Stallion Mountain: Genre Mash-ups
constellations_other.description: The Bombay Royale are known for combining funk, disco and pop with the sounds of classical Indian music together with the soundtracks of Bollywood cinema. Their music videos similarly hybridise  genres and styles to create intoxicating visual mash-ups.
